thread.title: Olympic star Tom Daley had secret 18-month affair with hunky 6ft 6in male model while fiancé Dustin Lance Black was away
thread.title_full: Olympic star Tom Daley had secret 18-month affair with hunky 6ft 6in male model while fiancé Dustin Lance Black was away

title: Olympic star Tom Daley had secret 18-month affair with hunky 6ft 6in male model while fiancé Dustin Lance Black was away
text:
TV Magazine DIVE ACE AT IT AGAIN Olympic star Tom Daley had secret 18-month affair with hunky 6ft 6in male model while fiancé Dustin Lance Black was away 
The 22-year-old is said to have enjoyed a string of 'purely physical' liaisons with 27-year-old Edward William Exclusive Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments OLYMPIC diving star Tom Daley had a secret 18-month affair with a male model while his fiancé was away. 
Tom, 22, enjoyed a string of “purely physical” liaisons with 6ft 6in Edward William, 27, after the pair swapped intimate messages online. Getty Images 5 Tom Daley had a secret 18-month affair with a hunky male model 
Brit model Ed began chatting online with Tom after a chance meeting in the street in 2014. 
Our source said: “They live near each other in London and caught each other’s eye. Tom Daley with Edward William 
“Ed obviously knew who Tom was, and was single at the time, so sent him a message.” 
He was initially invited to a barbecue at Tom and Dustin’s flat in Borough, South London, and had coffees with the pair, who had recently gone public. 
But Tom is then said to have invited him round when Dustin, who he called Lance, was out of the country, leaving Ed in no doubt as to his intentions. 5 Taking the plunge . . . Edward in the tub 
Our source said: “Ed said the messages Tom sent would say things like, ‘I’m home and horny, can you come round?’ 
“Others would say, ‘Lance is away, are you going to be about?’” 
Ed is believed to have told his friends about their meetings and their relationship became an open secret among sections of the local gay community. 
The insider said: “Ed told them it was a purely physical relationship with not much emotion involved. 
“He said Tom was very confident and forward with a huge sex drive.” 5 How The Sun covered Tom’s cyber sex romps last month 
Last month we revealed how Tom had internet sex sessions with a male fan from Liverpool but the star said he had been on a break from Dustin at the time. 
He said: “We don’t have secrets. 
“It’s totally crucial to us that we are completely and totally open with each other.” 
Our source went on: “Ed met Dustin socially at the start of the friendship, but he thinks he did not know Tom was contacting him privately. 
“It would always happen when Dustin was away and would be quite short-lived. 
“They would hook up for half an hour or an hour and that would be it. 
“Tom would rarely talk about Dustin to Ed, except to say that he was away. Getty Images Tom with hubby-to-be film director Dustin Lance Black 
“His and Tom’s meetings had an air of secrecy about them. 
“Ed is not sure about Tom and Dustin’s relationship and has said that perhaps they have an agreement that each of them can do what they want.” 
Ed and Tom’s affair ended in 2015 but they have been in touch as recently as this month. RELATED STORIES Here is all you need to know about Tom Daley's fiance Dustin Lance Black DIVE BEEN A NAUGHTY BOY Tom Daley confesses to fiance to online sex with another man after video emerges 'it’s not easy on your body' Olympic hero Tom Daley reveals back problem that could leave him in a wheelchair LONG DISTANCE Olympic hero Tom Daley could get married to boyfriend Dustin Lance Black live on Skype IT BOMBS Tom Daley reveals doomed diving show Splash! has been ‘rested’ after Rav Wilding sues for 'life changing' leg injury eat like an olympian Diver Tom Daley explains how you can get a toned body like his, with these healthy, home-cooked meals 'I want a whole dive team!' Olympian Tom Daley reveals he and fiancé want kids as he looks to future after Rio heartbreak 
Our source said: “Tom has been in touch but Ed is not interested as he is with someone else.” 
Tom and Dustin have recently revealed they would like to start a family. 
Tom’s representatives declined to comment. 
Ed said: “I do not wish to discuss this.” Tom Daley: I'm in a relationship with a guy
